description: A representation of a Modget main manifest following the v4 specification.

publisher.description: GitHub organization name, otherwise name of the main uploader on CurseForge/Modrinth

iconUrls.description: Sort from best to worst quality, otherwise Modrinth → CurseForge → GitHub/GitLab etc.

updatedAlternatives.description: If there is no working version of this mod for newer Minecraft versions and other people have ported it / mods of very similar scope exist

packageId.title: ID of the alternative package
packageId.description: ASCII (without periods and non-URL characters) representation of the publisher and mod ID, separated by a period.

name.description: Name of the mod, see CurseForge/Modrinth or fabric.mod.json

description.description: Short description from CurseForge/Modrinth/Github or fabric.mod.json

source.description: Website containing the source code listed in fabric.mod.json

issues.description: Issues page of the project listed in fabric.mod.json

support.description: An official website where users can get support from the developers

wiki.description: Link to an official wiki (no third-party one!)

chats.description: Links to official chats provided by the mod developers

versions.description: All versions of the mod we support. Copy them from fabric.mod.json, and only modify them if they aren't semver compliant!
